name: Basecamp Highlight Your Assigned ToDos
description: The original Basecamp applied a yellow background to tasks that were assigned to you. This is missing from the Basecamp 2, and can make it hard to pick out your tasks if you have many long lists. This style applies the yellow background again, but requires a little digging in order to find your unique user ID used by Basecamp under the hood. You can also apply colors for other Basecamp users.
